title: First aid
brief_description: A film of historic interest: an official training film produced for the War department in three parts. Part 1: emergency treatment of bleeding wounds, including self-administration. Covers the arterial system, pressure points and application of tournequets. Part 2: emergency treatment of broken bones. Part 3: covers methods of removing the wounded.
